details: Arouses latent syphilis. Periodicity very marked; symptoms recur every two and three weeks. Weakness. Swollen feeling of parts.

Head: Low spirited, memory weak
DESIRE TO BE ALONE
Annoyed by visions, causing her to cry
Head feels too large
Left-sided headache up to eyes and into ears
Headaches worse stooping and lying down Oedematous swelling of forehead
Abdomen: Sore pain in liver goes through to shoulders and spine
Pain in spleen down to groin
Pain in breast extends to hip and spleen
Diarrhoea, burning watery stools with relief of pain
Face: Eyes swelled and watery, burn with coryza
Eyes weak, day and gas light unpleasant
Mouth: The tongue coated white, and shows imprint of the teeth

name: Arsenicum metallicum
